Class TextFile

java.lang.Object
TextFile
public class TextFile
extends java.lang.Object
Used to handle all Text File related operations

      Parameters:
      toAdd - content to write into the file
      reWrite - if the file should be reWritten

      Parameters:
      filePath - path of the textFile to be created

    • textFileNew

      public static boolean textFileNew​(java.lang.String filePath)
      Checks if the textFile with given filePath would be new
      Parameters:
      filePath - path of the file to check
      Returns:
      true if the file is new, false if it already exists
